board.name: MY-KIT-062S2-43012
board.summary: The BSP MY-KIT-062S2-43012 is the next generation board for XYZ applications
board.prov_capabilities: adc arduino capsense capsense_button capsense_linear_slider cat1 comp dma flash_2048k hal i2c i2s j2 led low_power lptimer mcu_gp memory memory_qspi multi_core nor_flash pdm psoc6 qspi rgb_led rtc sdhc smart_io spi sram_1024k std_crypto switch uart
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • Ready-to-Use CAPSENSE™ Trackpad
  • EZ-BLE PRoC module
  • Potentiometer
  • Rechargeable coin-cell battery

Kit Contents:
  • MY-KIT-062S2-43012
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • ABC Sensor
  • Four press-fit connectors (for Arduino headers)
  • Four jumper wires
  • Quick Start Guide
